## IProtectableMapParameters interface

Constructor parameters for [ProtectableMap](./node-core-library.protectablemap.md)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface IProtectableMapParameters<K, V> 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [onClear](./node-core-library.iprotectablemapparameters.onclear.md) | <code>(source: ProtectableMap&lt;K, V&gt;) =&gt; void</code> | An optional hook that will be invoked before Map.clear() is performed. |
|  [onDelete](./node-core-library.iprotectablemapparameters.ondelete.md) | <code>(source: ProtectableMap&lt;K, V&gt;, key: K) =&gt; void</code> | An optional hook that will be invoked before Map.delete() is performed. |
|  [onSet](./node-core-library.iprotectablemapparameters.onset.md) | <code>(source: ProtectableMap&lt;K, V&gt;, key: K, value: V) =&gt; V</code> | An optional hook that will be invoked before Map.set() is performed. |
